title: Harry Reid Mocks 'Banana Republican' Mindset
body: Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid: “The Senate bill is a short-term extension, it’s what it is. This is a six-week funding bill, it’s all it is. Six weeks. If we can’t pass this we are truly entering a banana Republican mindset. This is what we look at other countries doing. The United States? We’re going to funding the government for a week, ten days at a time? Not so good.”
